attributes.action: Ensure that the review of MP's expenses is paid for by MP's themselves and not by the long suffering taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The review of MP's expenses over the last four years by an independent body should be paid for by MP's and not the taxpayer.  No doubt such a review will be very costly and as MP's created the mess they should pay to get themselves out of the mess.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
